title: Bug 114905 - Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying
description:
Description: When modifying the default value set in a list box of a report parameter, the default value is lost.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value of the list box to 'aaa'.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Change the Display type to Combo Box.
5. Click on the OK button.

Actual Behavior:
After step 5, the default value is not set and the OK button is still enabled.

Expected Behavior:
The default value should be 'aaa' and the OK button should be disabled after step 5.
